name: Splatter Blaster
description:
Welcome to the splatter fest use your shut gun to propel your self to around spikes and other things. Use your special power to turn into a ghost but at the cost of some gathered points from coins or just tough it out and dodge and run from danger.

Controls 

wasd and arrow to move

mouse click to fire or left alt 

e to go into ghost mode reduces score by 20.

left shift run

esq pause

Controller 

d - pad or right stick to move

a - jump

b - run 

y - ghost mode - reduces score by 20.

x - fire weapon

start pause menu
